question: I have never written a line of code before, can I cope?
answer: This training is especially designed for you, we are starting everything from scratch.

question: Can I follow up with the training on my phone?
answer: While you may be able to read texts and watch training videos on your phone, you will need a computer (laptop or desktop), to follow up with the coding and complete exercises.

question: Are all of the classes, pre-recorded?
answer: Most of classes are pre-recorded, some other classes and the project walk-through are Live classes.

question: Is there a complete curriculum for the training?
answer: There is a structure of the areas we have mapped out to cover in this training. Also, yes, there is a comprehensive curriculum for the training, broken down into weeks, lessons, etc, to enable you have an idea of the training roadmap. You have access to these materials once you have enrolled for the training.

question: What do I need to get started?
answer: A good laptop with minimum specification(core i3, 8gb RAM, 256gb ROM), a good internet connection, a readiness to learn.

question: How long will the program be for?
answer: It has been structured to last for 13-16 weeks
